title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it doesn't have any effect on the rendered output. This issue needs to be addressed.
OB: The display property of an item set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter is not taking effect on the rendered output.
EB: The display property of an item set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter should hide the item from the rendered output.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the new PDF emitter.
3. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
4. Generate the PDF output.
5. Verify that the item is not visible in the PDF.
